participant_1.background:
I have a diverse ethnic background, but I identify most with my Filipino heritage.
I like to play video games with my friends to take my mind off of things.
my favorite hobby is knitting.
I pretended to be asleep when the cop approached my car.
I prefer to keep my hair natural, as I like to focus on the food I cook.

participant_2.background:
I'm five foot nine inches tall, but I don't care because I love my body.
I was honored to be able to donate blood in honor of my late sister.
My collection of raincoat-wearing toys is priceless.
i play quarterback.
I'm a singer, although my asthma limits my singing to solos.

content.text: What is your favorite thing about yourself?
I am comfortable with myself and my body. I am 5'9'' and I love it!
I am a quarter Filipino and I love my heritage. I love to cook Filipino food and I am really good at it.
That is awesome! I love food in general and I love trying new foods. What is your favorite Filipino dish?
I love adobo! I love the flavor and the texture. I also like to cook it with some red potatoes and onions.
That sounds delicious! I love potatoes and onions. I never had adobo before but I will try it!
You should! It is really easy to make and it is super delicious.
I will! What is your favorite video game to play with your friends?
I love to play Mario Kart with my friends. We always have a lot of fun and we always get really competitive.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love playing video games with my friends too. We usually play Call of Duty or Halo.
I love Call of Duty! I am not very good at it but I have a lot of fun playing it.
That is the best way to play video games! Just have fun and enjoy yourself
